name: Warhammer 40,000: Carnage
summary:
All New Playable Character, Exclusive Levels and New Flamer Weapons!
New and Improved Fireteams! We've made it easy to find and recruit your Friends.

Run and gun through screaming hordes of frenzied enemies in this fast-moving, high powered, action side-scroller. Jump into the kick-ass Warhammer 40,000 universe, obliterating infernal Orks in this stunning world. Warhammer 40,000: Carnage is built for anyone who loves fast action, and destroying stuff, and lots of it!!
